name: Lockheed Martin
description: Worked on the Targets and Countermeasures software engineering team

Responsible for creating a tool in C++ that checked that the values of parameters fell within their expected ranges before being used in the flight software. Both the big and little endian versions used a binary file (containing the actual values) and an excel file (containing the expected ranges) as input, and the incorrect ranges were outputted to the excel file. The ranges were not known so the excel file was also to be used as a reference for the parameter ranges while containing the description, type, units, reference file location, etc. to help with determining the ranges.
Worked with a team to check test and reference data for the newest flight software
Obtained an Interim Secret clearance
title: Intern

Created and edited data, sequence code and ladder logic for different types of PLC blocks
Wrote and edited macros in Excel to be applied at the office to make processes easier/faster
Built and tested systems before being released to the customer
title: Co-op engineer
